import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete organization type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/types/{OrganizationTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a single organization type by OrganizationTypeId. Use this when you need to retire a specific type and you have confirmed it is not referenced by active organizations.

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-types-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Review type usage by querying organizations or types.
2. Call [DELETE /api/v1.0/organizations/types/\{OrganizationTypeId\}](/docs/api/organizations/delete-organization-type).

**Minimal Required Fields**: OrganizationTypeId path parameter.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated and performs a destructive action.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"OrganizationTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
